channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 12 Best Gifts for Every Kind of Golfer (2024)
item.description: Make your favorite golfer’s day with the best gifts to enhance every part of their game.

item.title: Fitness tracker Whoop faces unhappy customers over upgrade policy

item.title: 17 Giftable Subscription Boxes (2025), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: We have options for coffee lovers, foodies, bookworms—and even those who are hard to shop for—with these gifts that keep on giving.

item.title: Trump fires Copyright Office director after report raises questions about AI training

item.title: Samsung Odyssey 3D (G90XF) Review: The Future of 3D Screens
item.description: It’s not always practical, but Samsung’s 3D gaming monitor makes me want to believe in the future of 3D displays.

item.title: 25 Best Gifts for Frequent Travelers (2025)
item.description: Shopping for the best gifts for travelers? Our guide features top picks that frequent fliers will truly appreciate.

item.title: Microsoft and OpenAI may be renegotiating their partnership
